missing_perms.self: I lack the permission `{permission}` for this.
missing_perms.self_channel: I lack the permission `{permission}` in the channel {channel} to do this.
missing_perms.other: You lack the permission `{permission}` for this command.
missing_perms.other_channel: You lack the permission `{permission}` in the channel {channel} to do this command.

errors.no_send_perm: I have no permission to send messages in your channel. Pls fix!
errors.no_channel: You don't own/has any voice channel.
errors.guild_not_setup: Guild was not setup-ed! Check `/help` for setup command
errors.request_error: There was an error while handling the request. Make sure that my message wasn't deleted and that I have sufficient permissions!
errors.title: Error
errors.unknown:
Something went wrong! {EMOTE_WARNING}
Report this error to `{owner_id}`!

misc.info:
Hey there {user}!
My prefix on this discord server is `/`
Run `/help` for a list of commands.
misc.show_description: information will be visible for others (default-false)

language.help: Manage bot's localization used on this server

embed.title: Available languages
embed.value:
*Use `/language set <language>` to set chosen language in this guild*
**OR**
*Type `/language reset` to set language to default(EN).*

setup.preview: Preview current setting for this guild

main.help: Setup main function (without touching other modules)
main.done:
**Setup done!**
Bot is ready for use on this server.
main.exists:
Bot is already configured on this server.
If you belive there is an error, contact developer in `/help`

embed.title: Module status
embed.value: *To enable/disable a module use `/module enable` or `/module disable`*

disable.embed_value: Select module from list bellow to be disabled.

enable.embed_value: Select module from list bellow to be enabled.

access.help: Manage users(set mod/admin) access to command use

listener.cooldown: Creating voice channels too quickly, wait a bit!

setup.done: Successfully created channel {channel}! Setup is done.

setname.help: Sets default name for custom voice channels
setname.invalid_range: Channel name must be in range from 1 to 100 symbols
setname.done: Successfully changed default voice channel name to `{value}`!

setlimit.help: Sets default user limit for custom voice channels
setlimit.done: Successfully changed default voice channel limit to `{value}`!

reset.help: Reset your VC name to default

set.invalid_range: Channel name must be in range from 1 to 100 symbols

name.done: Successfully changed your's channel name to `{value}`!

reset.help: Reset your VC limit to default

limit.done: Successfully changed your's channel limit to `{value}`!

claim.help: Claim ownership of channel once owner has left
claim.not_in_voice: You are not connected to any voice channel
claim.not_custom: You can't own this voice channel
claim.has_owner: The owner of this channel is in this voice channel
claim.done: You are now owner of this voice channel {channel}!

lock.help: Locks your channel for @everyone (ex. allowed users)

unlock.help: Unlocks your channel for @everyone (ex. disallowed users)

ghost.help: Hides your channel for @everyone (ex. allowed users)

permit.help: Gives the user permission to join your channel
permit.invalid_args:
You didn't provided users.
Usage: `/permit <mention member/-s or role/-s>`
permit.not_self: You can't add yourself or me.
permit.done: Successfully permited {targets} to connect to your channel!

reject.help: Withdraw the user permission to join your channel
reject.invalid_args:
You didn't provided users.
Usage: `/reject <mention member/-s or role/-s>`
reject.not_self: You can't remove yourself or me.
reject.done: Successfully rejected {targets} from connecting to your channel!

reset.help: Reset voice channel permissions to default (sync with category)
reset.done: Successfully synced channel permissions with category!

reset.help: Resets user voice settings to default values

list.help: Shows added webhooks to bot's list
list.option_all: Show all webhooks in this server? (default-false)

embed.title: Webhooks
embed.none_found: *There are no webhooks on this server found.*
embed.none_registered: *There are no webhooks registered in bot's DB!*

move.help: Move registered webhook to another channel
move.option_channel: Choose the channel to move webhook to
move.error_not_found: Couldn't find webhook by entered ID.
move.error_channel: Couldn't move webhook to that channel.

add.help: Add webhook to the bot's DB

create.help: Create new webhook to be registered
create.option_channel: Choose channel in which create webhook (default-this channel)
create.invalid_range: Webhook's name must be in range from 2 to 100 symbols

select.help: Select existing webhook to be registered
select.error_registered: Selected webhook is already registered in bot's DB!
select.error_not_found: Couldn't find webhook by entered ID.

remove.error_not_found: Couldn't find webhook by entered ID.
remove.error_not_guild: Selected webhook is not from this guild.

about.help: Get basic information about the bot

embed.about_value:
Discord bot for personal use. Written in Java using JDA library.
Developer - **{developer_name}**({developer_id}).
embed.commands_value: Use `/help` in any chat to get list of commands.

help.help: List all available commands the bot has or description of specific command.

command_info.no_command:
The provided command (`{command}`) doesn't exist!
Make sure you typed it correctly.

Category names need to be prefixed with `cat:` (e.g. `/help cat:voice`)!
command_info.title: Command help: {command}

description.command_value:
To get more info about a specific command run `/help [command]`.
You can also run `/help cat:[category]` to show the commands of a specific category.
description.support_value: If you need help with the bot, contact the owner `{owner_name}`.

bot.dm_failure: I can't send you a DM!
